docs.abstract: Charming locals in Scotland can’t save Brooke Shields and Cary Elwes from the script of this formulaic holiday rom-com.
docs.snippet: Charming locals in Scotland can’t save Brooke Shields and Cary Elwes from the script of this formulaic holiday rom-com.
docs.lead_paragraph: In “A Castle for Christmas,” the best-selling author Sophie Brown (Brooke Shields) had the gall to throw a favorite character down a staircase in her latest novel. Now her fans are furious. Even the talk-show host Drew Barrymore — played by the talk-show host Drew Barrymore — is critical of Sophie’s actions.

headline.main: ‘A Castle for Christmas’ Review: Deck the Halls With Expensive Tartans

docs.abstract: New developments suggest the long-running inquiry has returned to an earlier focus: the valuations the former president and his family business applied to properties as it sought loans.
docs.snippet: New developments suggest the long-running inquiry has returned to an earlier focus: the valuations the former president and his family business applied to properties as it sought loans.
docs.lead_paragraph: A long-running criminal investigation into Donald J. Trump and his family business is reaching a critical phase as Cyrus R. Vance Jr., the prosecutor overseeing the inquiry, enters his final weeks as Manhattan district attorney.

headline.main: Trump Investigation Enters Crucial Phase as Prosecutor’s Term Nears End

byline.original: By Ben Protess, William K. Rashbaum, Jonah E. Bromwich and David Enrich

docs.abstract: Lee Merritt, a lawyer for the family of Ahmaud Arbery, said there was “more than enough evidence” for the jury to bring a verdict in the murder trial.
docs.snippet: Lee Merritt, a lawyer for the family of Ahmaud Arbery, said there was “more than enough evidence” for the jury to bring a verdict in the murder trial.
docs.lead_paragraph: Lee Merritt, a lawyer for the family of Ahmaud Arbery, said there was “more than enough evidence” for the jury to bring a verdict in the murder trial.

headline.main: ‘We Will Wait as Long as It Takes,’ Says Arbery Family Lawyer

docs.abstract: The governing Law and Justice party’s tough stance on migrants seeking to enter the E.U. from Belarus has lifted its popularity, which had taken blows from Covid and rising inflation.
docs.snippet: The governing Law and Justice party’s tough stance on migrants seeking to enter the E.U. from Belarus has lifted its popularity, which had taken blows from Covid and rising inflation.
docs.lead_paragraph: BRUZGI, Belarus — Thousands of freezing, desperate migrants retreated last week from a sprawling encampment along Belarus’s border with Poland but Polish security forces are still mobilized for battle along the frontier, backed by a water cannon, its turret aimed at a threat that has mostly vanished, at least from view.

headline.main: Migrant Crisis at Poland’s Border Eases Pressure on Its Government

byline.original: By Andrew Higgins and Monika Pronczuk

docs.abstract: Stella Creasy received a letter of complaint for attending a debate with her infant son in tow. After an outcry, the speaker of the House of Commons said that a committee would review the rules.
docs.snippet: Stella Creasy received a letter of complaint for attending a debate with her infant son in tow. After an outcry, the speaker of the House of Commons said that a committee would review the rules.
docs.lead_paragraph: LONDON — Moments after Stella Creasy, a Labour lawmaker, left a parliamentary debate on Tuesday, she received an official complaint by email.

headline.main: British Lawmaker Is Reprimanded for Bringing Her Baby to a Debate

docs.abstract: Whether you’re smoke-averse or all-in on them, these mezcal- and scotch-based cocktails will satisfy.
docs.snippet: Whether you’re smoke-averse or all-in on them, these mezcal- and scotch-based cocktails will satisfy.
docs.lead_paragraph: Smoking in crowded bars may mostly (and happily) be a relic of the past, but the cocktail glass itself hasn’t lost all elements of smoke — often imparted by ingredient alone. Many fall in one of two smokiness camps: You like — insert Scotch or mezcal here — or you don’t.

headline.main: Smoky Cocktails Without a Single Ember

docs.abstract: Even in the best of times, social gatherings can be overwhelming. If you’re feeling less-than-festive, here’s how to ease into the season.
docs.snippet: Even in the best of times, social gatherings can be overwhelming. If you’re feeling less-than-festive, here’s how to ease into the season.
docs.lead_paragraph: A few years ago, during a prepandemic holiday celebration, several generations of my family were crammed, as usual, into the cozy kitchen of my parents’ New Jersey house. As everyone hollered, spilled drinks and accused each other of double-dipping chips, the clamor made me lightheaded.

headline.main: It’s Beginning to Look a Lot Like Holiday Social Anxiety

docs.abstract: This will be the first time Adam Mosseri, a trusted lieutenant to Mark Zuckerberg, will appear before lawmakers under oath.
docs.snippet: This will be the first time Adam Mosseri, a trusted lieutenant to Mark Zuckerberg, will appear before lawmakers under oath.
docs.lead_paragraph: Adam Mosseri, the head of Instagram, has agreed for the first time to testify before Congress, as bipartisan anger mounts over harms to young people from the app.

headline.main: The head of Instagram agrees to testify as Congress probes the app’s effects on young people.

byline.original: By Ryan Mac and Cecilia Kang

docs.abstract: What you’ll find at this year’s tropical circus: hundreds of galleries, institutions proudly exhibiting homegrown work and an array of NFT-themed gatherings.
docs.snippet: What you’ll find at this year’s tropical circus: hundreds of galleries, institutions proudly exhibiting homegrown work and an array of NFT-themed gatherings.
docs.lead_paragraph: MIAMI BEACH — It’s back. Canceled last year because of Covid-19, the annual Art Basel Miami Beach fair returns next week, unfolding throughout the area. Beginning on Tuesday with invitation-only hours, and open to the public Thursday through Saturday, it will feature 253 galleries exhibiting work inside the city’s Convention Center, as well as a dizzying number of accompanying satellite art fairs, pop-up shows, and celebrity-studded private dinners.

headline.main: Art Basel Miami Beach Returns, Smaller but Ready to Party

docs.abstract: What’s the secret? It’s using pulverized rice cakes as a binder, Melissa Clark writes.
docs.snippet: What’s the secret? It’s using pulverized rice cakes as a binder, Melissa Clark writes.
docs.lead_paragraph: Whether bite-size Thai shrimp patties spiked with fish sauce, Vietnamese shrimp paste packed onto sugar cane or Southern American shrimp burgers shot through with mayonnaise, savory shrimp cakes are a tasty staple in coastal regions all over the world.
